hiveArticle.title: Lovely & Colorful Scene in Village
hiveArticle.body:
Recently I have been to my Village, Ramsara in Rajasthan. It was raining when I reached there and the scene was awesome afterward as shown below.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUgzyE8MEVMrP1AsnqRiXswi8LT3hQPuW8vJJqYkNQAsM/image.png)
